title: ExerciseNoticeGiverEnum
description: Defines the principal party to the trade that has the right to exercise.

oneOf.title: AsSpecifiedInMasterAgreement
oneOf.description: Specifies that the Master Agreement defines the principal party to the trade that has the right to exercise.

oneOf.title: Both
oneOf.description: Specifies that both the option buyer and option seller has the right to exercise.

oneOf.title: Buyer
oneOf.description: Specifies that only the option buyer has the right to exercise.

oneOf.title: Seller
oneOf.description: Specifies that only the option seller has the right to exercise.
